BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO ACTCAS_AL_CHAL_APRV_TRN(STR_CHALLAN_NO,DT_CHALLAN_DATE,STR_APPROVE_BY_AO,STR_APPROVE_BY,DT_APPROVAL_DATE,STR_REMARKS,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GDT_EFFECT_DATE,GDT_ENTRY_DATE ,GNUM_ISVALID ,GNUM_SEAT_ID ,gnum_hospital_code,STR_MODIFY_SL_NO ) (SELECT T.STR_CHALLAN_NO,T.DT_CHALLAN_DATE,T.STR_APPROVE_BY_AO,T.STR_APPROVE_BY,T.DT_APPROVAL_DATE,T.STR_REMARKS ,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,T.GDT_EFFECT_DATE,T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE ,T.GNUM_ISVALID ,T.GNUM_SEAT_ID ,T.gnum_hospital_code,(select nvl(max(A.STR_MODIFY_SL_NO),0)+1 from ACTCAS_AL_CHAL_APRV_TRN A where A.STR_CHALLAN_NO=T.STR_CHALLAN_NO and A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) FROM ACTCAS_CHAL_APRV_TRN T WHERE T.STR_CHALLAN_NO=? AND T.gnum_hospital_code=? )

UPDATE ACTCAS_CHAL_APRV_TRN Y SET Y.STR_APPROVE_BY_AO=?,Y.STR_APPROVE_BY=?,Y.DT_APPROVAL_DATE=?,Y.STR_REMARKS=? ,Y.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,Y.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE Y.STR_CHALLAN_NO=? AND Y.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE ACTCAS_CHAL_TRN T SET T.STR_CHALLAN_STATUS =? WHERE T.STR_CHALLAN_NO=? AND T.gnum_hospital_code=?
UPDATE ACTCAS_CHAL_ONLINE_TRN T SET T.STR_CHALLAN_STATUS=? WHERE T.STR_CHALLAN_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
